nodes.bodyText: can we rename it as getParameter

I think the position is not required for us. Instead what if we directly maintain ColumnInfo ? It gives us precision, scale, signed details for a particular column. Can we create something like this
            ColumnInfo.Builder builder = new ColumnInfo.Builder()
                    .setCatalogName("") 
                    .setSchemaName("") 
                    .setTableName("") 
                    .setColumnLabel(resultSet.getString("Position"))
                    .setColumnName(resultSet.getString("Position")) 
                    .setColumnTypeSignature(column.getTypeSignature())
                    .setNullable(Nullable.UNKNOWN)
            setTypeInfo(builder, column.getTypeSignature());
            list.add(builder.build());

We just need to map the APIs for ColumnInfo when iterating over PrestoParameterMetaData.
@electrum Your feedback on this approach ?
Can we move SQL keywords to upper case ?

We need to implement all of these methods, otherwise programs that use the driver will fail. For nullable, it's fine to always return columnNullableUnknown. Using ColumnInfo as @Praveen2112 suggested should make this easier, as we'll have some of this information.
Can we rename this method as getParamerters
But would there be any cases where the getArguments would be empty for CHAR or VARCHAR or DECIMAL ?
can we make it package protected ?
Post this PR (#4023) for these types we would get parameters.
Can we add VARCHAR type with specific length ?
It would be better if we add test for scale and precision
can we move throws SQLException to next line
Can we rename it as builder
as columnInfoBuilder
Can we import it as static method ?
Can we move this to getType ?
can you please also bigint, int, tinyint, smallint, float and double?
can you test isNullable, isSigned and getParameterMode?
Nit. This is a logical change that should go in separate commit to commits with refactoring like this (extract, renames etc). Refactoring commits should only contain IDE automatic changes.

make it static
